skills.name: Black Prana's Snare
skills.desc: Has a high chance for all targets to become afflicted with Prana-Siphon.

skills.name: Rite of Great Arbor Metamorphosis
skills.desc: Continuously deal Wind DMG to a random target, with a high chance to cause Wind Shear.

skills.name: Guiding Vulturnus
skills.desc: Deals Wind DMG to the targeted and adjacent allies, with a high chance to cause Wind Shear.

skills.name: Arboreal Thorns
skills.desc: Deals Wind DMG to a single target, with a high chance to cause Wind Shear.

skills.name: Rite of Subduing Prana
skills.desc: Enters Japa. Cast "Black Prana's Snare" on all targets during the next action.

skills.name: Black Prana's Snare
skills.desc: Has a high chance for all targets to become afflicted with Prana-Siphon.

skills.name: Vitals Drained
skills.desc: When attacking targets in the Prana-Siphon state, the DMG dealt by this attack will be converted to Prana-Siphon and refresh the state's duration. A max HP cap exists for Prana-Siphon.

skills.name: Rite of Great Arbor Metamorphosis
skills.desc: Continuously deal Wind DMG to a random target, with a high chance to cause Wind Shear.

skills.name: Guiding Vulturnus
skills.desc: Deals Wind DMG to a target and its adjacent targets, with a high chance to cause Wind Shear.

skills.name: Arboreal Thorns
skills.desc: Deals Wind DMG to a single target, with a high chance to cause Wind Shear.
